entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @MikeKellyPA @realDonaldTrump @POTUS The records show when trump and WH officials got notice of the virus - months before it became a pandemic. How many lives were lost before taking any action? The POTUS/WH officials cannot wish away or pass responsibly for the death of 82k+ COVID-19 deaths in the USA.
